about.title: About Paktio
about.subtitle: Defined by Integrity. Driven by Intelligence. Secured by Mathematics.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We are reimagining legal agreements for the digital age. We believe that a contract should be more than just text on a pageâ€”it should be an immutable, verifiable record of truth.

sovereignty.title: Sovereign Documents
sovereignty.content: In a world of ephemeral data, Paktio stands for permanence. We build tools that respect the sanctity of the agreement, ensuring that what you sign is exactly what stays on record, forever.

roots.title: Scandinavian Roots
roots.content: Born in Oslo, Paktio embodies the Scandinavian principles of transparency, trust, and minimalist design. We strip away the unnecessary to focus on what matters: the agreement itself.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At Paktio, document integrity and data sovereignty are at the core of everything we build. This policy outlines how we protect your information in accordance with GDPR and EEA standards.

sovereignty.title: 1. Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.content: We believe your data belongs to you. Paktio serves as a custodian of your legal agreements. All data entered into the Paktio Block Schema is stored securely in the EEA.

integrity.title: 2. Document Integrity
integrity.content: Our "Integrity Rule" uses SHA-256 hashing to ensure that once a document is signed, its state cannot be modified without voiding the signatures. This cryptographic proof is stored alongside your document metadata.

rights.title: 3. Your Rights
rights.content: As per EU law, you have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data. You may request a full export of your account data at any time through the Settings page.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By using Paktio, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the application.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account, including enabling Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) where available. Paktio is not liable for unauthorized access resulting from insecure account management.

validity.title: 3. Legal Validity
validity.content: Paktio provides tools for Advanced Electronic Signatures (AdES) as per eIDAS standards. However, users are responsible for ensuring that their specific agreements do not require a Qualified Electronic Signature (QES) under local law.

integrity.title: 4. The Integrity Rule
integrity.content: Paktio enforces a strict document integrity policy. Modification of any document content after a signature has been applied will result in the immediate and irreversible voiding of all existing signatures for that version.
